thread.title: CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion in Michigan with New Franchise Store in Grand Rapids
thread.title_full: CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion in Michigan with New Franchise Store in Grand Rapids - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion in Michigan with New Franchise Store in Grand Rapids
text:
CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion in Michigan with New Franchise Store in Grand Rapids
Independence, OH, October 22, 2015 --( PR.com )-- CPR Cell Phone Repair, the largest and fastest growing retail mobile device repair franchise network in North America, is pleased to announce the opening of a new store in Grand Rapids, MI. CPR congratulates multi-store owner Clayton Nicholson on the opening of his most recent franchise store located in Grand Rapids.
Nicholson stated, “Our team has worked really hard to open four CPR franchises in the Michigan market. We have two franchise locations in Grand Rapids in addition to our stores in Kalamazoo and Portage. Our team is looking forward to our continued expansion as we make plans to open new CPR franchise stores in Lansing, South Bend and Fort Wayne.”
Grand Rapids is the second-largest city in Michigan. Nicknamed “Furniture City,” Grand Rapids has a long history as a major furniture manufacturing center. The city remains home to five of the world’s leading office furniture companies including Steelcase, Haworth and Herman Miller. Grand Rapids and its surrounding area has become economically more diverse with the expansion of other industries including information technology plus automotive, aviation and consumer goods manufacturing. Spectrum Health is now the area’s largest employer. In addition to industry and health care, Grand Rapids is also a major cultural and tourism hub in the region. In 2010, Grand Rapids was named the “most sustainable midsize city in the United States” by the U.S. Chamber of Commerce.
“CPR is delighted that Clayton Nicholson and his team have continued to expand CPR’s services within the busy Grand Rapids market. Clayton now has four CPR franchise stores in Michigan and he is continuing to expand CPR’s footprint throughout the region. We congratulate Clayton and his entire team on their newest CPR store,” added Josh Sevick, CPR President.
CPR Cell Phone Repair Grand Rapids South is located at 3567 28th Street SE, Grand Rapids, MI 49512.
To learn more about the store’s full range of electronic device repair services, call 616-365-5066 or contact via e-mail at clayton@michigan-cpr.com.
For further information, visit the website: http://www.cellphonerepair.com/grand-rapids-south-mi/
For further information about Clayton Nicholson’s other CPR franchise locations in Michigan, please visit the following websites:
CPR Grand Rapids North: http://www.cellphonerepair.com/grand-rapids-mi/
CPR of Kalamazoo: http://www.cellphonerepair.com/kalamazoo-mi/
CPR Portage: http://www.cellphonerepair.com/portage-mi/
About CPR Cell Phone Repair
Founded in Orlando, Fla. in 1996, CPR Cell Phone Repair is the fastest growing wireless technology franchise in North America and operates 200 locations internationally. As a pioneer and leader in the electronics repair industry, CPR offers same-day repair and refurbishing services for cell phones, laptops, gaming systems, digital music players, tablets and other personal electronic devices. CPR was named an Entrepreneur Magazine Franchise 500 (2013) ranking and earning a top brand on the Inc. 500, CPR continues to lead the mobile device repair industry. For more information about CPR Cell Phone Repair and franchise opportunities, visit http://www.cellphonerepair.com/ or call 877-856-5101.
For further information, please contact:
Shari Kosec
Director, Onboarding and Franchisee Relations
CPR Cell Phone Repair
skosec@cellphonerepair.com
216-674-0645 x616
